attributes.action: MPs should only be allowed to use public services.Health & Education especially
attributes.additional_details:
All MPs who wish to take advantage of the privileges of being in Parliament must use the same public services as the citizens of this country.

If all MPs regardless of party and background are legally obliged to use the NHS & are legally obliged to send their children to comprehensives we will all see an improvement in services.

The people making decisions about services as important as health,education and welfare should be legally obliged to use them.

If they don't like it, don't become an MP.
